Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= process by which someone's name is put in a family register

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= man, better known as Artaxerxes I; ◄ son of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) (Xerxes I); ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא) and Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

Node.gloss: to put in (someone's) mouth > to give (to someone) to speak
Node.definition: literally: to put in (someone's) mouth; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans the assignment to pass on a specific message to others
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא)
= fellow member of the same group of people, not necessarily relatives, sharing a bond of affection, employment, or a common purpose
= location; ◄ in Babylonia (בָּבֶל)|literally, the ones given or the dedicated ones; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man; ► Levite; after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities make a public announcement

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= canal; ◄ in Babylonia (בָּבֶל)
= river or canal; ◄ Chaldea

plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
literally: straight way; = journey without accidents or incidents
= dependents of a household, especially women and pre adolescent children; it could include older people that are physically impaired

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= soldier riding a horse
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call

literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: to be asked; hence: = action by which deities listen to the prayer of humans and respond to it

Node.gloss: to separate|to set apart|to single out|to exclude|to detach
Node.definition: = action by which part of a group is dissociated from the rest
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= close relative, such as one's uncle's son and one's brother's son, or someone else regarded as closely related

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

= a person whose official role and responsibility it is to give advice to someone in authority

literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
literally: (someone's) hand; = state in which humans bear the responsibility for a certain situation

= weight of approximately 30 kilograms, equals 3000 shekels (שֶׁקֶל) or 60 minas (מָנֶה)

= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

Node.gloss: to be polished|to be bright|to shine like gold
Node.definition: = state in which metal shines like gold; ◄ possibly by polishing
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which objects have such a high quality ► that they provoke in others the desire to possess them
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= something offered to God as a free gift without any obligation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans take hold of an object and accept responsibility for it
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= canal; ◄ in Babylonia (בָּבֶל)
= river or canal; ◄ Chaldea
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation

literally: palm of the hand, with the focus on one of the activities that are performed with the hands: to hold someone against that person's will; = condition of being under the malevolent control of another person or group
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to lie in wait|to lay an ambush|to lurk
Node.definition: = to go to a location where one will not be readily seen by others; ► and wait there for an opportunity to seize or attack someone or do something else that is supposed to be done when nobody else can witness it

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the fourth in a range

literally: (someone's) hand; = state in which humans bear the responsibility for a certain situation
= man; ◄ son of Uriah (אוּרִיָּה) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Meremoth (מְרֵמֹות) priest, after exile

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= various men; ► after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= various men; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► after exile
= man; ◄ son of Binnui (בִּנּוּי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite; after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Noadiah (נֹועַדְיָה) Levite, after exile
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which humans determine the number of objects
= causative action by which humans write down names or other information for record keeping purposes, without an explicit reference to a scroll or other writing materials
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
= state in which a countable entity is ninety in number
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= young of a sheep (שֶׂה) either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing
= state in which a countable entity is seventy in number
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= male domestic animal, generally black in color, found in both shorthaired and longhaired varieties, with horns, usually herded together with sheep; ◄ Capra hircus mambrica or Capra hircus angorensis; ► clean animal, source of milk, hides, hair, and horns, may be used for sacrifice; ≈ sometimes associated with demons, regarded as aggressive
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= person in charge of part of the Persian empire
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia

Node.gloss: to care for|to assist|to help|to support
Node.definition: literally: to hold, carry; hence: = action by which humans provide help and support to other humans

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
